item.title: apache kafka
item.description: Watch Now Panel Outline Picks Download Video Audio Panel Brandon Burton github, twitter Jay Kreps twitter blog Outline LinkedIn Apache Kafka @apachekafka Kafka Defined: Kafka is a distributed, partitioned, replicated commit log service. It provides the functionality of a messaging system, but with a unique design. Getting Started: Introduction FAQ Documentation Mailing Lists irc.freenode.net/#apache-kafka Replication & Use Cases Partitions ZooKeeper & Kafka Apache Hadoop Confluent @ConfluentInc Confluent Launch Building a Company Around Open Source Infrastructure Support & Services Docker Inc.
